events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position from the candidate and will begin processing their information.
The application has been categorised under the engineering cluster due to the candidate’s background in software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to the candidate to coordinate further steps and provide support throughout the process.
The candidate completed the initial screening with positive feedback on their experience and technical skills.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm about moving forward with the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team for next week to assess the candidate’s coding capabilities.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and sound engineering knowledge.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and to further evaluate candidate fit.
The HR interview was completed positively, with the candidate showing alignment to our values and enthusiasm for the role.
An official offer has been proposed to the candidate outlining compensation, benefits, and start date expectations.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to accept and join the company.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed their start date as discussed during the offer phase.
The new engineer has started onboarding processes including introductions, training sessions, and access to development environments.
The hiring process is now closed with the successful integration of the candidate into the engineering team.
